name: Modern Leather Armchair
details: Sleek and comfortable armchair upholstered in genuine leather. Perfect for any contemporary living room or office space.

name: Vintage Velvet Sofa
details: Elegant vintage-style sofa with plush velvet upholstery. Adds a touch of luxury to any room.

name: Ergonomic Mesh Office Chair
details: Highly adjustable ergonomic office chair with breathable mesh backrest. Provides optimal support for long hours of work.

name: Rustic Wooden Dining Chair
details: Handcrafted wooden dining chair with a rustic finish. Sturdy and charming, perfect for farmhouse-style kitchens.

name: Sectional L-Shaped Sofa
details: Spacious L-shaped sectional sofa upholstered in soft fabric. Offers plenty of seating for family and guests.

name: Industrial Pendant Light
details: Stylish pendant light with an industrial design. Adds a touch of urban flair to any room.

name: Eames Lounge Chair and Ottoman
details: Iconic mid-century modern lounge chair and ottoman set. Timeless design and ultimate comfort.

name: Sleek Glass Coffee Table
details: Contemporary coffee table with a tempered glass top and metal frame. Adds sophistication to any living space.

name: Vintage Chandelier
details: Exquisite vintage chandelier with intricate details. Adds a touch of glamour to dining rooms or entryways.

name: Classic Leather Recliner
details: Luxurious leather recliner chair with plush cushioning. Perfect for relaxing in style after a long day.
